original_text: “‘Your southern side will include some of the Desert of Zin along the border of Edom. Your southern boundary will start in the east from the southern end of the Dead Sea,
korean_text: 너희 남쪽은 에돔 곁에 접근한 신 광야니 너희의 남쪽 경계는 동쪽으로 염해 끝에서 시작하여

sentences.original_text: Your southern side will include some of the Desert of Zin
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 남쪽 경계는 진 광야의 일부를 포함할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Your southern boundary will start in the east
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 남쪽 경계는 동쪽에서 시작될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: from the southern end of the Dead Sea
